name: Color Break (Marty Starkiller (Twin Pines Soft))
description:
A fun little game with big-sized fun

Made for the LOWREZJAM 2020, Color Break is a game all about colors. You got 8 types of colors to collect, but watch out! Once you select one color, you can't pick another one! And there are also some bad guys trying to make you explode! (Or at least make you go insane, trust me)

So what are you waiting for? Go ahead and download it!

or do you want something else?
